Cravex

Cravex is a scraper which can scrape ice and collect samples or scrape large sand dunes and collect samples. The collector part is detachable and attachable.

See More...
Solique

SOLIQUE is a robotic solid to liquid converter that helps in collecting solid ice and checking its composition roughly

XyLinder

Xylinder is a sample container. This is a new invention rather than a developed stage of the existing sample containing bags and boxes.
